bean.description: 根据CategoryId查询该分类下的所有搜索选项条件（同时返回所有CategoryId为null 的记录）

constructor-arg.value: SELECT * from t_pd_search_con where (category_id is NULL or category_id = :cid ) and lifecycle = 1

bean.description: 根据CategoryId查询分类列表下的所有搜索选项条件（同时返回所有CategoryId为null 的记录）

constructor-arg.value: SELECT * from t_pd_search_con where (category_id is NULL or category_id in (#foreach( $id in $cids ) $id, #end -1) ) and lifecycle = 1
update t_pd_search_con_lang set name=:name where search_condition_id=:searchconditionid and lang=:lang

bean.description: 根据id列表查询简要的分类信息

constructor-arg.value: select *from t_pd_search_con_lang where search_condition_id in( #foreach($id in $scids) $id, #end -1 ) and lang in( #foreach($lang in $langs) '$lang', #end '-1' )
select *from t_pd_search_con_lang where search_condition_id =:id and lang =:lang
